title.narrative: Capacity Building for UNHCR livelihood officers on value chain analyses for refugees - 2018

description.narrative: The project aims to build the capacity of global and regional UNHCR livelihood officers through a value chain analysis training course and on-the-job training during value chain analyses in three selected countries. Specifically, the project focuses on four activities: the delivery of a one-week specifically designed training course for global and regional livelihoods officers, the conduction of value chain analyses in three countries with on-the-job training for livelihood officers, the facilitation of market assessment sessions during five regional trainings, and the provision of distant support for market assessments in up to three countries.
